headline: Ecolab Schedules Webcast and Conference Call on July 29, 2025
summary: ST. PAUL, Minn., June 17, 2025--Ecolab will host a live webcast to discuss its 2025 second quarter results. A news release containing second quarter results is expected to be issued before market open on July 29, 2025.

headline: Madison Sustainable Equity SMA Q1 2025 Investment Strategy Letter
summary: The first quarter saw the S&P 500 deliver a total return of -4.3%, largely driven by a -5.6% decline in March. Read more here.
